programme.sub-title: S2010 : E01 World Finals XI - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Racing
programme.desc: Don't miss all the racing thrills and excitement from the Monster Jam World Finals 11 on March 27, 2010.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.sub-title: S2012 : E01 M&T Bank Stadium - Baltimore, MD
programme.desc: Don't miss the Monster Jam kickoff to the Path of Destruction tour at M&T Bank Stadium in Baltimore, MD.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2000 : E12 Superdome - New Orleans, LA - Freestyle
programme.desc: The fun doesn't stop as Monster Jam continues in New Orleans- this time with freestyle action that just won't quit!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2005 : E14 Reliant Stadium - Houston, TX - Racing
programme.desc: It's a jam-packed night in Houston- watch the best of the best compete with racing action from Reliant Stadium, on February 5, 2005.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2001 : E20 Alltel Stadium - Jacksonville, FL - Freestyle
programme.desc: It's time for freestyle! This time, Monster Jam takes on Alltel Stadium in Jacksonville, FL during the 2001 season.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2015 : E17 MetLife Stadium - East Rutherford, NJ - Racing
programme.desc: Monster Jam races into MetLife Stadium on June 13, 2015!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2001 : E03 Metrodome - Minneapolis, MN - Racing
programme.desc: The gauntlet has been thrown- a past champion goes up against the current champ in a battle for the top in Minneapolis, MN at the Metrodome.

programme.title: Arena Series in 30
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E01 Bridgestone Arena - Nashville, TN
programme.desc: Monster Jam revs into the Bridgestone Arena for the excitement of a new season of Arena Series in 30!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2002 : E20 Silverdome - Pontiac, MI - Freestyle
programme.desc: Monster Jam blasts into the Silverdome with freestyle! It's the most extreme monster jam action you'll see anywhere!

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E02 World Finals XXIIII - Rice-Eccles Stadium - Salt Lake City, UT - Day 2
programme.desc: It's Day 2 of the 2025 World Finals from Salt Lake City, Utah!

programme.title: International Tour
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E27 London Stadium - London, England
programme.desc: It’s a special international edition of Monster Jam from London Stadium. See the highly anticipated debut of the four Marvel Monster Jam trucks Thor, Ironman, Spider-Man, and Black Panther. See them go head-to-head against MaxD, Grave Digger, El Toro Loco, and Megalodon for the Overall Event Championship.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.desc: Monster Jam goes to Holland! The Gelredome, in Arnhem hosts as Team Marvel and Team Destruction go head to head.

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.desc: He is vengeance... he is the night... he is the Batman Monster Jam truck! Experience the ultimate tribute to Gotham's Caped Crusader with the BEST freestyle runs and jaw-dropping stunts captured. This compilation proves why The Dark Knight is the hero Monster Jam deserves!

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E23 Superman Throwback Highlights Compilation
programme.desc: Enjoy this throwback compilation of the best of the Superman monster truck!

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Best of Marvel Monster Trucks
programme.desc: We’ve gathered the most jaw-dropping highlights featuring the Marvel-themed monster trucks. Featuring The Amazing Spider-Man, Thor, Iron Man, and Black Panther. AND - Genius, billionaire, playboy, monster truck. Suit up for this action packed compilation of Marvel's Iron Man as we highlight the best freestyles of driver Brandon Arthur and this hero on four wheels!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E19 Edward Jones Dome - St. Louis, MO - Freestyle
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2010 season continues with all the epic freestyle action from the Edward Jones Dome, on February 6, 2010.

programme.title: Arena in 25
programme.sub-title: S2022 : E15 Pinnacle Bank Arena - Lincoln, NE
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2022 season continues with round 15 at Pinnacle Bank Arena in Lincoln NE.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2002 : E03 Astrodome - Houston, TX - Racing
programme.desc: They say everything's bigger in Texas and all the big stars and the monster jam are on hand tonight! Monster Jam racing action kicks off at the Astrodome.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.sub-title: S2014 : E02 Reliant Stadium - Houston, TX
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2014 season at Reliant Stadium in Houston, TX featuring Championship race and freestyle competitions.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2019 : E01 Vivint Smart Home Arena - Salt Lake City, UT
programme.desc: Monster Jam trucks take to the track during the January 4-5, 2019 appearance at Vivint Smart Home Arena in Salt Lake City, Utah. Featuring Tyler Menninga in Grave Digger, Elvis Lainez in El Toro Loco, Tanner Root in Monster Mutt, Colton Eichelberger in Max-D, Tony Ochs in Soldier Fortune Black Ops, Myranda Cozad in Scooby-Doo, Austin Minton in Megalodon and Bari Musawwir in Zombie.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E04 Alamodome - San Antonio, TX
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East begins the road to World Finals XXIII at the Alamodome. Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga begins defense of his series championship while Tristan England debuts the newest truck in the Monster Jam fleet, JCB Digatron. Max D’s Tom Meents kicks-off his final competitive season.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2008 : E18 Edward Jones Dome - St. Louis, MO - Freestyle
programme.desc: Don't miss your favorite trucks and drivers compete with freestyle action from St. Louis, MO, on February 16, 2008.

programme.sub-title: S2009 : E15 Superdome - New Orleans, LA - Racing
programme.desc: Monster Jam races into the Louisiana Superdome on January 31, 2009.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2018 : E15 Gillette Stadium - Foxborough, MA
programme.desc: The competition is getting fierce as we near the end of the 2018 Monster Jam season.

programme.title: Primetime
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E19 Lucas Oil Stadium - Indianapolis, IN
programme.desc: Monster Jam Primetime continues with even more action in Indianapolis.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E25 Snapdragon Stadium - San Diego, CA
programme.desc: Monster Jam heads to San Diego, California to show off their motor skills at Snapdragon Stadium with freestyle and racing action!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E20 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Racing
programme.desc: Don't miss the thrills and excitement of racing action from Raymond James Stadium, on February 6, 2010.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E13 Tucson Arena - Tucson, AZ
programme.desc: Arena Championship Series West heats up the Arizona desert as Earth Shaker’s Tristan England gets one step closer to winning the series. Meanwhile, El Toro Loco’s Elvis Lainez isn’t ready to just give the series championship to England and looks to shrink the points gap. It’s a race to the finish to see who will earn the automatic bid to Monster Jam World Finals XXII in Nashville.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2001 : E12 RCA Dome - Indianapolis, IN - Freestyle
programme.desc: Indianapolis is the home of motor sports and tonight, the roof of the RCA Dome will be raised as Monster Jam trucks compete in freestyle action. Will one man stand alone as champion? Find out now!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2006 : E05 Silverdome - Pontiac, MI - Racing
programme.desc: Pontiac Silverdome hosts Monster Jam one last time before it gets destroyed with bombastic racing action on January 7, 2006.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2017 : E15 Carrier Dome - Syracuse, NY
programme.desc: The 2017 season of Monster Jam races into the Carrier Dome with more racing and freestyle action from all your favorite drivers and trucks!

programme.sub-title: S2011 : E17 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Buckle in for all the epic racing and freestyle action from Raymond James Stadium, on February 5, 2011.

programme.sub-title: S2022 : E16 LoanDepot Park - Miami, FL

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E16 Moody Center - Austin, TX
programme.desc: Bari Musawwir makes a rare appearance in El Toro Loco, as he has an epic battle with Krysten Anderson and Tristan England for the Overall Event Championship as Arena Championship Series West takes over the Moody Center in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E25 Rookie And Rising Star World Finals Freestyles Compilation
programme.desc: Ride along with Monster Jam as we rewind to the unforgettable World Finals freestyle debuts of past Rookie of the Year & Rising Star award winners! Witness the explosive runs the very year they clinched those prestigious titles.Catch a glimpse of the humble beginnings of drivers like Coty Saucier, Camden Murphy, Jamie Sullivan, and more. These are the moments that started it all!

programme.sub-title: S2014 : E16 Cowboys Stadium - Arlington, TX - Freestyle
programme.desc: Monster Jam is LIVE with freestyle action from AT&T Stadium on February 28, 2014.

programme.sub-title: S2018 : E02 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA

programme.desc: The heat is on in the Georgia Dome as your favorite trucks and drivers fire up the engines and show their style in freestyle action.

programme.title: My Secret Romance

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi struggles to meet the unreasonable demands of her boss.

programme.title: My Secret Romance

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.
